sys_rest_message_fn.content:
{ "name": "${partner_name}", "uid": "7001", "gid": "7000", "type": "user", "homeFolder": "/usrdata/BU/Axway/${bu}/${partner_name}", "homeFolderAccessLevel": "PRIVATE", "notes": "This is demmo user ", "skin": "Default HTML Template", "loginRestrictionPolicy": "", "authByEmail": false, "disabled": false, "businessUnit": "${bu}", "transfersWebServiceAllowed": true, "managedByCG": false, "transferType": "${type}", "accountEncryptMode": "UNSPECIFIED", "subscriptionFolderDiscovery": "ITERATIVE", "fileArchivingPolicy": "DEFAULT", "contact": { "email": "${mail}", "phone": "${phone}" }, "adhocSettings": { "deliveryMethod": "DEFAULT" }, "unlicensed": false, "isUnlicensedUserAllowedToReply": false, "routingMode": "ignore"
}, "accountMaintenanceSettings": { "policy": "default", "accountDisabledDate": 0, "accountNotified": false, "accountPasswordNotified": false, "accountCertificateNotified": false } }
